Learnt a lot. Well  the programming knowledge was there but didnt know how to put them together to build a project from scratch. Well worth it. Will take the knowledge to build more projects,

results.content: Course abandoned by tutor. Won't respond to emails, guarantees a fully functional site but doesn't deliver. Assumes a lot of knowledge even though he says the course is for everyone.

results.content: I'm not satisfied with this course as the this course is incomplete. The lecturer mentions see you in the next video after lecture 53 but he posts the so called full solution. The course does not show you how to submit your comments, save "likes", build the registration page etc. I hope the lecturer will complete this course by adding the missing videos.

results.content: I love the way you, teach, you clarify everything

results.content: This course helps lay the foundation out for how to build a social network; the instructor is great.  More importantly, it lays the foundation for how to create any type of site that deals with registered users, and there is a huge variety of things that can be accomplished with the knowledge taught in this course.
results.content_html: This course helps lay the foundation out for how to build a social network; the instructor is great. More importantly, it lays the foundation for how to create any type of site that deals with registered users, and there is a huge variety of things that can be accomplished with the knowledge taught in this course.

results.content:
This course won´t give you a basic knowledge for anything. 
I´m really disappointed and want my money back. He basically gives you the code without explaining the details. 
When he gets to asp.net part, witch is the most important one, he doesn´t even show or explain what is happening, just "give" you the code. For what is worth you can´t learn anything from it.
Don´t buy this!
